Argh! KSL just reminded me that I still have Unitron and Firestarter 
and his mercenaries!

::Unitron/Firestarter/Choran/Imprisoner/Predator::

Unitron stops in a hallway, listening to a transmission from FZ.

"Allright, the Maximals seemed to have stopped fighting again. Let's 
get out of here," he says to the bots behind him. He, Firestarter, 
and the three mercenaries set off toward the exit of the CF where 
Unitron had planted the horns (are the horns still there?).
